title: Tim Draper
body:
IP Objective: Tim Draper
Minimum Fund Raising Target: 500 000
Maximum Fund Raising Target: 1 000 000
Stake Pool Start Date: 2021.12.01  18:00
Stake Pool End Time: 2021.12.05    19:00

A prominent venture capitalist and founder of the venture capital firm Draper Fisher Jurvetson and Draper University, Tim Draper has invested in Skype, Tesla, SpaceX, Twitter, and Coinbase. He’s also known for his Bitcoin price forecasts, as well as his vocal support for this particular digital currency. 

On his Twitter account, which has around 185,000 followers, Draper shares his insights on Bitcoin, crypto, and opportunities for digital currencies.
author: 0x6c665834015f725Bd27FECDA2394806BE3b8D6d9
